memberdef.name: CM_SetTrmEdgeSidedness
memberdef.initializer: { \ if ( !(edge->sideSet & (1<<bitNum)) ) { \ float fl; \ fl = (bpl).PermutedInnerProduct( epl ); \ edge->side = (edge->side & ~(1<<bitNum)) | (FLOATSIGNBITSET(fl) << bitNum); \ edge->sideSet |= (1 << bitNum); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: CM_SetTrmPolygonSidedness
